alert.note: Alert for Gila; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 3:01PM MST until August 11 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 301 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Top-Of-The-World, or 9 miles northeast of Superior, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Gila and Pinal Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
